message: Just considering the options.

@Jobes do you know if Thunderbolt can be added to last year's Mac Pro?
Thunderbolt right now is a PCI-E technology so theoretically you could if apple released a PCI-E card to expand it with it should work, however I don't believe they would do that.

I agree with ingox3 once again. :) While is something they probably could do I don't see it happening for quite some time if at all. They'd much rather we all go buy a new Pro rather than a much cheaper expansion card for our existing hardware.
